title: Holding Your Encounters Fast
description: Spiritual encounters are divine deposits, designed to shift a man’s direction, fuel purpose, and birth undeniable results in life. However, many people lose the potency of their encounters because they fail to hold fast to them and act on them intentionally.

title: Riding on the High Places of the Earth
description: God desires that as His children, we take total dominion of the earth. Hence, as believers, we must hold on to this truth and position ourselves rightly to reign and rule everywhere we find ourselves.

title: Finding the Word of God
description: The word of God contains everything that we would ever need to live victoriously in life. Finding truths from God’s word and what we do with what we have found would determine how much results we would get with the word.

title: Transformative Word Encounters
description: An encounter with God’s word is one of the most powerful encounters a man can have. Hence, it is important that we place the highest value on the revelations we catch from God’s word and allow them to steer the course of our lives.

title: The God of Jacob
description: God’s supernatural help is real. One of the ways He moves on our behalf and delivers help to us is through the ministry of angels. These angels are sent by God to deliver blessings, breakthroughs, and divine direction.

title: Dominating Over Cities
description: Throughout the Bible, we see how God lifted people like David and Esther into places of honour and authority, positioning them to influence nations according to His will. This is still God’s desire for us today — to plant us in positions of power to dominate sectors, influence decisions, and establish His will on the earth.

title: Responding to God’s Favour by the Spirit
description: God’s favour opens doors to opportunities beyond human understanding. It causes a man to enjoy visibility, elevation, and prosperity, as well as take on new territories.

title: The Hand of God
description: The hand of God is what turns situations around and brings miracles into our hands. Throughout scripture, we see countless accounts of how God’s mighty hand intervened in the lives of people to deliver destiny breakthroughs and triumphs.

title: The Findings of Righteousness
description: Righteousness is a gift that cannot be worked for; it is gotten by faith in the finished works of Jesus Christ. God’s word shows us all that believers begin to enjoy access to when we submit to the righteousness of God.

title: Faith in Jesus for Miracles
description: The believer can be assured of daily miracles from God because he has put his faith in Jesus. These miracles happen, not by us actively striving to muster up faith in difficult situations, but by leaning more on God’s grace.

title: The Multiplying Effect of God’s Blessings
description: When God created man, He blessed him with dominion and all he needs to reign in life. One of the components of this blessing is the power of multiplication that causes man to increase, expand, and ultimately take over.

title: The Bringing Power of God
description: God is able to bring everything we need—without toil or struggle—just as He did for the Israelites in biblical times. These divine provisions come through the working of His mighty hand in our lives.

title: Breaking Longstanding Stagnation
description: God desires that the believer enjoys ever-increasing joy, progress and light. Despite this, some believers still face seasons of stagnation. We can break free from such seasons when we rise up deliberately and take intentional action.

title: How to Run Faster than the Chariots of the Systems
description: The believer’s victories in the systems and sectors of the earth are not tied to earthly policies and schemes, but to the power of God. As a result, the believer is always able to outrun and rise above every limitation in the systems designed to cripple people’s destinies and limit God’s plans.

title: The Power of Establishment in Righteousness
description: Believing in Christ Jesus is the only way to righteousness and the abundant blessings that come with it. When we believe in the sacrifice of Jesus for us, we are able to stand before God without fear, guilt or condemnation. This consciousness of our righteousness in Christ also empowers us to walk in dominion and fulfill God’s purpose on earth.

title: Mighty Risings and Great Prosperity 2
description: Prosperity is not just God’s desire for us. It is a provision secured through the death, burial, and resurrection of Jesus Christ. However, it is important that we know why God has entrusted us with this provision.

title: Humiliating Sickness and Death
description: Jesus Christ defeated sickness and death on the cross, granting us victory over them and liberating us from fear. However, to enjoy this victory completely and utterly humiliate the spirit of death and all its forms in our lives, we must rise and exercise our God-given authority.

title: Mighty Risings and Great Prosperity
description: Prosperity is not just God’s desire for us. It is a provision secured through the death, burial, and resurrection of Jesus Christ. However, it is important that we know why God has entrusted us with this provision.

title: The Results of Redemption
description: Jesus Christ paid the ultimate price for our sins and secured our redemption when he died on the cross. Through this sacrifice, we have been set free from the grip of sin and its destructive effects, and our fellowship with God has been completely restored.

title: The Blessings of Righteousness
description: Righteousness confers on us, the ability to stand before God, without the feeling of fear, guilt and inferiority. It is not merely a remedy for our past mistakes, it is a new nature that makes us partakers of a divine inheritance in Christ.

title: Soul Winning and Discipleship
description: Every believer is entrusted with the responsibility of winning men to God and discipling them. Fulfilling this responsibility, however, sometimes requires us to step out of our comfort zones to reach the unsaved who need Christ and guide them as they grow in their faith.

title: Ruling by the Word
description: By God’s design, the believer is to rule and have dominion on earth. We are called to determine the culture of our sectors and nations. One way God ensures this happens is by granting us wisdom from His word to navigate the systems of the world and rise into prominence

title: The Prayer of Thanksgiving
description: Thanksgiving is one of the ways we exercise our faith in God. Just like other forms of prayer, thanksgiving is a powerful weapon that opens up the door for God’s miraculous intervention in times of need.

title: Reproducing Graces
description: God’s word contains the power to transform any life, break any bondage, heal any disease and deliver great victories to anyone who will receive it. To receive and enjoy all of these and the many other benefits encapsulated in God’s word, it is important to receive the word of God with an open heart.

title: The Prosperity of the Believer
description: God’s word contains the power to transform any life, break any bondage, heal any disease and deliver great victories to anyone who will receive it. To receive and enjoy all of these and the many other benefits encapsulated in God’s word, it is important to receive the word of God with an open heart.

title: Understanding the Takeover
description: God has entrusted us with authority over everything on earth and in heaven. This means we are not mere bystanders in the world. We have been called to lead, influence and takeover places spiritually, economically and politically.

title: The Position of Christianity in the Advancement of a Place
description: God’s word contains the power to transform any life, break any bondage, heal any disease and deliver great victories to anyone who will receive it. To receive and enjoy all of these and the many other benefits encapsulated in God’s word, it is important to receive the word of God with an open heart.

title: Sowing into the Spirit
description: God’s word contains the power to transform any life, break any bondage, heal any disease and deliver great victories to anyone who will receive it. To receive and enjoy all of these and the many other benefits encapsulated in God’s word, it is important to receive the word of God with an open heart.

title: Largeness of Heart
description: One of the greatest barriers to doing big things for God is the fear to dare big things. This often reveals itself in an attachment to money or the fear of losing it. True freedom from this comes only when our hearts are large enough to trust God completely. The way we get to that point is by our continuous giving, as revealed in Proverbs 11:24.

title: How to Walk in God’s Strength
description: While it takes great strength to pursue God’s vision and plan for our lives, the Bible assures us that we can rely on God for supernatural energy. By doing this, we can lay hold on His promises to us and fulfill His plans and purposes for us without burning out.
